Package com.deepwelldevelopment.dwdengine

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deepwelldevelopment.dwdengine.Window

  • public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a GLFW window. Initializes the GLFW instance and creates the OpenGL context
    Since:
    1.0

        public void resize​(int width,
                   int height)
        Changes the size of the window
        Parameters:
        width - The new width of the window
        height - The new veight of the window

      • close

        public void close​()
        Tell GLFW that the window should close. Does not actually close thw window, however since the GLFW render loop is traditionally done using GLFW.glfwWindowShouldClose(long) this should trigger a window close after the next frame.

      • render

        public void render​()
        Renders the windows components to the OpenGL context. THis render function clears the screen and delegates rendering, as well as swaps the window buffers. Most rendering occurs within the root canvas and its children
